Description.Name: WF-M620-RSC1
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This header lists the available peripherals for the AI-Link WF-M620-RSC1
// and provides the header definition and application manifest values required to use them.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN1_GPIO41
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 1 exposes GPIO 41. Pin shared with GPIO4, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN1_GPIO4
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 1 exposes GPIO 4. Pin shared with GPIO41, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN2_GPIO42
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 2 exposes GPIO 42. Pin shared with GPIO5, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN2_GPIO5
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 2 exposes GPIO 5. Pin shared with GPIO42, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN3_GPIO43
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 3 exposes GPIO 43. Pin shared with GPIO6, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN3_GPIO6
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 3 exposes GPIO 6. Pin shared with GPIO43, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN4_GPIO44
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 4 exposes GPIO 44. Pin shared with GPIO7, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN4_GPIO7
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 4 exposes GPIO 7. Pin shared with GPIO44, PWM Controller 1, and ADC Controller 0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN5_GPIO26
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 5 exposes GPIO 26. Pin shared with GPIO8, UART0, SPI0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN5_GPIO8
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 5 exposes GPIO 8. Pin shared with GPIO26, UART0, SPI0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN6_GPIO27
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 6 exposes GPIO 27. Pin shared with GPIO9, ISU0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN6_GPIO9
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 6 exposes GPIO 9. Pin shared with GPIO27, ISU0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN7_GPIO28
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 7 exposes GPIO 28. Pin shared with GPIO10, ISU0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN7_GPIO10
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 7 exposes GPIO 10. Pin shared with GPIO28, ISU0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN8_GPIO29
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 8 exposes GPIO 29. Pin shared with GPIO11, UART0, SPI0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN8_GPIO11
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 8 exposes GPIO 11. Pin shared with GPIO29, UART0, SPI0, and PWM Controller 2.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN9_GPIO30
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 9 exposes GPIO 30. Pin shared with ISU0.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN10_GPIO32
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 10 exposes GPIO 32. Pin shared with ISU1.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN11_GPIO34
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 11 exposes GPIO 34. Pin shared with UART1 and SPI1.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN14_GPIO31
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 14 exposes GPIO 31. Pin shared with UART1 and SPI1.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN15_GPIO33
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 15 exposes GPIO 33. Pin shared with ISU1.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN16_GPIO35
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 pin 16 exposes GPIO 35. Pin shared with SPI1.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PWM_CONTROLLER1
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 PWM CONTROLLER 1: channel 0 on pin 1, channel 1 on pin 2, channel 2 on pin 3, and channel 4 on pin 4. Pins for this controller are shared with AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN1_GPIO4/GPIO41, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN2_GPIO5/GPIO42, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN3_GPIO6/GPIO44, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN4_GPIO7/GPIO45. If this PWM controller is requested, none of these GPIOs can be used.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PWM_CONTROLLER2
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 PWM CONTROLLER 2: channel 0 on pin 5, channel 1 on pin 6, channel 2 on pin 7, and channel 4 on pin 8. Pins for this controller are shared with AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN5_GPIO8/GPIO26, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN6_GPIO9/GPIO27, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN7_GPIO10/GPIO28, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN8_GPIO11/GPIO29. If this PWM controller is requested, none of these GPIOs can be used.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ADC_CONTROLLER0
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ADC CONTROLLER 0: channel 0 on pin 1, channel 1 on pin 2, channel 2 on pin 3, and channel 3 on pin 4. Pins for this controller are shared with AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN1_GPIO4/GPIO41, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN2_GPIO5/GPIO42, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN3_GPIO6/GPIO43, AILINK_WFM620RSC1_PIN4_GPIO7/GPIO44. If this ADC controller is requested, none of these GPIOs can be used.

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ISU0_UART
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ISU 0 configured as UART, pin 7 (RX), pin 5 (TX), pin 8 (CTS), pin 6 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ISU0_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ISU 0 configured as SPI, pin 7 (MISO), pin 5 (SCLK), pin 8 (CSA), pin 6 (MOSI) and pin 9 (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ISU0_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ISU 0 configured as I2C,  pin 7 (SDA) and pin 6 (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ISU1_UART
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ISU 1 configured as UART, pin 15 (RX), pin 14 (TX), pin 11 (CTS), pin 10 (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ISU1_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ISU 1 configured as SPI, pin 15 (MISO), pin 14 (SCLK), pin 11 (CSA), pin 10 (MOSI) and pin 16 (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: AILINK_WFM620RSC1_ISU1_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: WF-M620-RSC1 ISU 1 configured as I2C,  pin 15 (SDA) and pin 10 (SCL).
